name: UNetbootin
description: UNetbootin is a cross-platform tool to make boot disks. Linux operating system can be loaded into the USB flash drive by it. Meanwhile, the boot disks that have been made can be used for computer maintenance and system restoration and other operations.

en_US.description: UNetbootin is a cross-platform tool to make boot disks. Linux operating system can be loaded into the USB flash drive by it. Meanwhile, the boot disks that have been made can be used for computer maintenance and system restoration and other operations.
en_US.name: UNetbootin

zh_CN.description: UNetbootin是一个跨平台制作启动盘的工具，能够将Linux操作系统装进U盘中。同时将制作好的启动盘用于电脑的维护和系统还原等操作。
zh_CN.name: UNetbootin
